name: Pacman 3D (otama studios)
description:
This is a ms pacman clone I was making and has been in development for a few months now, the cause for the making of this game was game that appeared on a site named Fetchfido as well as egg2 and jelly games.  here is a bit of footage:

I used the same sounds cus I love the game, at the start of the year 2020 fetchfido and egg2 site's vanished, I am contact with the people that own fetchfido to see what happend to their site.

But jelly games, (jeez don't get your hopes up) vanished 10 years ago,  now the game can only be played with wayback machine and if you do want to play it make sure you a shockwave player in installed.

Anyway this game is a remake with the same sounds and same models

enjoy!

Note: packages take a while to load, so if you download the game it will take more time, ask me and I will add your website to the game for free!
